message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I believe I can offer you $100 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking more like $125 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I think I can offer you $110 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I'm still a bit far apart. I'm thinking $132.50 for the product. It's a fair price, considering its value to you.
Alice, thank you for your flexibility. I would like to propose $127.5 for the product.
I'm not willing to go much lower, Bob. I think I can meet you at $137.50 for the product. It's the best I can do.
Alice, I understand your position. I would like to propose $135 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'm thinking $139 for the product is the absolute maximum I can offer. It's a fair price, considering its value to you.
Alice, I appreciate your efforts. I would like to propose $137 for the product.
